name: Rolly Avion
description:
ROTATION

Game about riding the plane by adjusting its pitch rotation!

Game made for Kenney Jam 2021 (theme - rotation) in Unity.

 All graphics, font used in this game are free to use from Kenney assets library. 

BGM are from pck404 at Puzzle Platformer Casual: Free Music Loop Pack 01 by pck404 (itch.io). 

SFX are made by Jimmy Studio in SFXR.

CONTROL

Click/Tap and hold to change the pitch of the plane
